ProductInfo.Features:

<4> Shutter Remote Control + <5> PD Mini Sling Backpack + <6> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod +

<10> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <11> LCD Screen Protectors + <12> 40.5-58mm Step Up Ring
